name: TIB#21: EL CAMINO CAR CRASH – Routine 12"EP (includes digital download)
description: EL CAMINO CAR CRASH features ex-members of Within Walls and Unveil, and is based in Dornbirn, Austria. The band plays 90s fueled hardcore that reminds of bands such as Unbroken, Undertow, Botch, The Suicide File, and The Hope Conspiracy. The vinyl version comes with a huge booklet. Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here. NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. ALL ORDERS WILL SHIP IN JANUARY 2014.

name: TIB#19: KIDS INSANE - Frustrated 7"EP (includes digital download)
description: Kids Insane is an angry hardcore band drawing its momentum from politics and events of the not-so-ordinary life in the state of Israel. In its lyrics, the band addresses issues such as the state of the nation, and the country’s lost generation of kids with no future ahead. Loaded with sarcasm, Kids Insane brings in a fresh and new attitude to the international hardcore community, where politics seem to have become a matter of the past. Kids Insane's latest EP was mixed by Dean Baltulonis (The Hope Conspiracy, The Suicide File, Give Up The Ghost, and The Hold Steady). Guest vocals by Scott Wade (Comeback Kid). Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here. NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. YOU ORDER WILL SHIP ON DECEMBER 21, 2013.

name: TIB#20: LIONS – Bit By Bit Cassette (includes digital download)
description: LIONS is a classic straight edge hardcore band from Switzerland with members that have been part of the Swiss scene for many years and even decades. After having played in bands such as Solid Ground, Animal Instinct, Liferide, Cataract and Mine, Ricki and Martin decided it was time to put the Swiss straight edge back on the map. Both have already played together in a short-lived but notable straight edge band in the mid 90s, DAMAGE I.D., and the two decided to revive their fruitful cooperation. The two were soon joined by Tom, formerly of Deadlock and Animal Instinct, and the new trio then recorded five songs with the help of their friends Simon (Reality Returns) and TC (Vale Tudo/Animal Instinct). Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#18: DEADVERSE - Go Ape Tape CS (includes digital download)
description: We have a few leftovers from the band's tour available exclusively from TAKE IT BACK!!! "Go Ape Tape" is a professionally duplicated 60 minutes discography cassette made for the band's 2013 tour. "Go Ape Tape" contains all of DEADVERSE's releases up to this day: "Carpet Burns" 12"EP (2013) "Caution To The Wind" LP (2011) "s/t" 7"EP (2009), "s/t" 7"EP (2007) plus one unreleased bonus track All songs have been remastered by Simon of Reality Returns. Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#17: DEADVERSE – Carpet Burns 12"EP (includes digital download)
description: DEADVERSE's latest release features six brand new songs. While "Carpet Burns" still sounds like DEADVERSE, there is yet another notable change in the band's sound, which adds a 90s emotive hardcore flavor. For fans of Wipers, Union Town, Rain, Gray Matter, Rites of Spring, As Friends Rust, Young Livers, and Small Brown Bike. Co-released with Adagio830. Pressing information: 99 copies on clear vinyl (only available from TAKE IT BACK) 99 copies on white vinyl (only available from Adagio830) 250 copies on black vinyl Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#08: DEADVERSE – Caution To The Wind LP (includes digital download)
description: After two self-released EPs and a self-released split-CD with Unveil, Switzerland’s DEADVERSE finally recorded eleven passionate and emotive songs for the band’s debut album. “Caution To The Wind” could be best described as a mix of Midwestern emo, Revolution Summer hardcore à la Gray Matter or Rites of Spring, Dackelblut, and even some Engine Down thrown in. And yes, singer Clive’s vocals, a native English speaker, somehow remind of At The Drive-In too. Drummer Lorenz also plays drums for Take It Back mates Beggars & Gentry. For fans of Wipers, Jawbreaker, Union Town, Rain, Gray Matter, Rites of Spring, At The Drive-In, and Dackelblut. Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: DEADVERSE – s/t 7"EP (2009)
description: The band's 2nd release after their self-released 7", DEADVERSE convince with an uncluttered '90s hardcore sound that is reminiscent of  Bad Brains, classics like Swiz, or early-era Dischord bands. Highly recommended to fans of early DC hardcore.

name: TIB#13: REALITY RETURNS – s/t 7"EP (includes digital download)
description: REALITY RETURNS is a Straight Edge Hardcore band from Southern Germany featuring former members of Teamkiller and Coldburn. Mastered by Alan Douches at West West Side Music, REALITY RETURNS’ debut EP will please fans of The Icemen, Biohazard, Merauder, and Sick Of It All. Pressing information: 100 copies on clear vinyl 150 copies on clear green vinyl 250 on black vinyl Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#16: KIDS INSANE – All Over LP (includes digital download)
description: KIDS INSANE hail from Tel Aviv, Israel, and play an insane mix of angry, yet melodic punk-rock (think Dillinger Four and Small Brown Bike) and modern hardcore (think Modern Life Is War, Verse, and Refused). Originally released as a CD-only album on Third Time Lucky Records, this album is now released on vinyl for the first time in co-operation by You're Next Records, Crapoulet Records, Derrick Hunter Records, and TAKE IT BACK. TAKE IT BACK made only 100 copies of this awesome album, 80 on multi-colored splatter vinyl and 20 on black (which is the limited pre-order version). Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#15: FORESEEN - Structural Oppression 7" (includes digital download)
description: This is a teaser for FORESEEN's upcoming full length, which is scheduled for later this year. These two exclusive recordings were brought to tape in late November of 2012. "Structural Oppression" is the sickest New York crossover worship (think Leeway and Nuclear Assault) with a heavy dose of NWOBHM thrown in. This 7" is co-released with Collision Records from Finland (www.collisionrecs.bigcartel.com). Pressing information: 100 clear vinyl (pre-order available only through TAKE IT BACK) 100 red vinyl (pre-order available only through COLLISION) 300 black vinyl Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#04: FORESEEN – s/t 7" (includes digital download)
description: FORESEEN from Finland plays brutal metal-influenced New York-style hardcore that reminds of bands such as CRO-MAGS, MADBALL, BIOHAZARD, MERAUDER and, yes, METALLICA. This is the 2nd pressing with slight altered artwork. Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#14: BECOME – Demo Cassette (includes digital download)
description: Hailing from Santa Barbara, California, BECOME reminds of the sound of past emotive hardcore bands such as Swiz, Rites of Spring, and Sawhorse, played with the passion of modern bands in the vein of Modern Life Is War. Explosive and high energy hardcore as well done as you would expect considering the members involved. BECOME features current and ex-members of Manumission, Ochre, Lumber Lung, X-Wing, Worship, Bone Explosion, Desperate Hours, Masisin, No Man's Land, Eden in Flames, Sutrama, Embassy, Uphill Battle, Broken Needle, Blasting Concept, and Surprise Vacation. This is a limited edition of 200 professionally duplicated cassettes which come with awesome looking printed covers. Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#10: ANIMAL INSTINCT – Unfinished Business LP (includes digital download)
description: ANIMAL INSTINCT considers itself to be a traditional hardcore band, having its homebase in the greater Zurich area (Switzerland). The band features ex and current members of Solid Ground, Vale Tudo, Play to Destroy, and Liferide to only name a few. Similar to the band’s 7"EP, the eleven original songs on Unfinished Business are heavily influenced by the band members’ favorite New York hardcore bands such as Straight Ahead, Outburst, and Raw Deal. So it does not come as a surprise that ANIMAL INSTINCT chose to include a KILLING TIME cover tune on Unfinished Business. Pressing information: 100 copies on white vinyl 150 copies on blue vinyl 250 copies on black vinyl Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#09: STATE OF MIND – Knowledge of Self 12"EP/CD (includes digital download)
description: Knowledge of Self" marks the band's return. Around since the beginning of 2005, and originally inspired by bands like Maximum Penalty, Breakdown, Supertouch, and Leeway, STATE OF MIND has been playing groovy NY-styled hardcore, adding different influences along the way. Blending their original sound with more of an emphasis on rhythm similar to "Meantime"-era Helmet, "Knowledge of Self" proves STATE OF MIND to be one of Europe's few standout bands. "Knowledge of Self" is a record about new beginnings and about changes in life, maintaining a critical stance in their lyrics towards society as well as towards oneself. In a time where hardcore seems to be getting more superficial by the day, STATE OF MIND tries to stand out from the masses, choosing its own path. Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#02: LIFERIDE – s/t 12" EP/CD (includes digital download)
description: Members of ANIMAL INSTINCT (Switzerland) and STATE OF MIND (The Netherlands) team up to deliver a unique mix of 80s hardcore and crossover/metal mania. If you like your dose of New York hardcore à la "Best Wishes"-era CRO-MAGS mixed with catchy crossover/metal madness in the vein of LEEWAY, then check out LIFERIDE! Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB#7.5: DO YOU EVEN CARE? GO VEGETARIAN! T-Shirt (Hanes)
description:
TIB#7.5: Do You Even Care? Go Vegetarian! T-shirt

Printed on Hanes shirts.

Show that you care!

Everybody at TAKE IT BACK supports a vegan vegetarian diet and drug-free lifestyle.  ♥

name: TIB#7.5: DO YOU EVEN CARE? GO VEGETARIAN! T-Shirt (American Apparel)
description:
TIB#7.5: Do You Even Care? Go Vegetarian! T-shirt

Printed on American Apparel shirts.

Show that you care!

Everybody at TAKE IT BACK supports a vegan vegetarian diet and drug-free lifestyle. ♥

name: TIB#05: UNVEIL – Hypnopaedia 7" (includes digital download)
description: Inspired by the heritage of the political 90s hardcore community, the vegan straight edge powerhouse UNVEIL from Switzerland combines influences by bands such as UNBROKEN, TRAIL and UNDERTOW with elements of modern hardcore, yet going a way of its own. Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

name: TIB #06: BEGGARS & GENTRY – Abwärts LP (includes MP3 download code)
description: BEGGARS & GENTRY are back with yet another bang. This Swiss band now sounds even more punk than before. For fans of Turbonegro, Fucked Up, Urban Blight and Government Warning. Includes download in your choice of MP3 320, FLAC, or just about any other format you could possibly desire. Stream this release here.

* Offer valid while supplies last.
** If the total of your order is under €40, you will not receive the free bonus item, even when added to your shopping cart. 
*** BigCartel does not allow to add this as free item, so the price must be at least €0.01 – sorry! But we like to think this still counts as "free".
